name: Capricious Visage
title: Preponderant Recollection: Capricious Visage
desc: Even a faint smile could not conceal her sorrow.\nThough this is a festive day, it seems more like a farewell...
inPlayDescription: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

skills.desc: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
